name: Doodle God & Doodle Devil
description:
Doodle God
Mix different elements to create your own universe in Doodle God! Starting from a single microorganism, create animals, tools, and even armies! Unleash your inner god with Doodle God™!
Doodle Devil
Embrace your dark side! While Doodle God was creating the universe, Doodle Devil was also having some fun.

1 player(s)
Network Features
10240KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
